_developer_note: These files are used for bot translations. Please do not remove keys. New keys should be added to both en.json and es.json. NOTE: If you change command names or descriptions here, you MUST also manually update the 'setNameLocalizations' and 'setDescriptionLocalizations' in the corresponding command file (e.g., src/commands/settings.ts) and redeploy commands.
